title: CMDA Intro A Mock: 2024
author: ayobami
description: the beginning of a series of questions extracted from the CMDA Intro A mock of 2024

questions.text: are all the substances below a positive stimulator for insulin?
questions.question: arginine, leucine, glucagon-like peptide

questions.text: Carbonic anhydrase inhibitors are contraindicated in:
questions.question: respiratory acidosis

questions.text: Carbonic anhydrase inhibitors are contraindicated in:
questions.question: liver cirrhosis
Anterior pituitary hormones are all negatively controlled by the hypothalamus except prolactin
Anterior pituitary hormones are secondarily produced by body organs
A1 adenosine receptor is implicated in diuresis

questions.text: Which of the drugs is a sympathomimetic stimulant: Tasmulosin(T), Cocaine(C), Amphetamine(A)
questions.question: T

questions.text: Which of the drugs is a sympathomimetic stimulant: Tasmulosin(T), Cocaine(C), Amphetamine(A)
questions.question: C

questions.text: Which of the drugs isn't a sympathomimetic stimulant: Tasmulosin(T), Cocaine(C), Amphetamine(A)
questions.question: A

questions.text: Which of the following drugs is a loop diuretic: Furosemide(F), Indapamide(I), Ethacrynic Acid(E), Axosemide(A)
questions.question: I

questions.text: Which of the following drugs is a loop diuretic: Furosemide(F), Indapamide(I), Ethacrynic Acid(E), Axosemide(A)
questions.question: E

questions.text: Which of the following drugs is not a loop diuretic: Furosemide(F), Indapamide(I), Ethacrynic Acid(E), Axosemide(A)
questions.question: F

questions.text: Secretion of growth hormone is stimulated by:
questions.question: sleep

questions.text: Secretion of growth hormone is stimulated by:
questions.question: stress

questions.text: Secretion of growth hormone is not stimulated by:
questions.question: somatomedin C
oxytocin is not used for the management of postpartum hemorrhage
